title: The Best Video Games of 2025
description: The best video games of 2025 across gaming platforms include continent-spanning adventures, psychedelic puzzles, and one 30-something couch potato who can’t help but fall on his ass.
content: Like the TV and movie industries, video games navigated choppy waters in 2025. There were yet more immiserating layoffs amid painful, executive-led pushes for AI. Yet the games themselves bore few tr… [+29249 chars]
